    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:aspect.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_e3688f2c4c7296eb6eddc16f647b74800511d430</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>CUP</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_e3688f2c4c7296eb6eddc16f647b74800511d430</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Force-separation curve of atoms</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kraft-Trennung Kurve der Atome</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">courbe de Force-séparation des atomes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">curva da Força-separação dos átomos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">curva di Forza-separazione degli atomi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καμπύλη δύναμη-χωρισμού των ατόμων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">curva de la Fuerza-separacio'n de átomos</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This line graph shows the resultant force between repulsion and attraction of two atoms. The resultant force is the vector sum of the attractive and repulsive forces, indicated as broken lines. The separation distance when repulsive force equals attractive force is the equilibrium separation. Resultant force is zero at equilibrium separation.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">attractive force</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">equilibrium separation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">repulsive force</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">resultant force</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vector sum</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Zeile Diagramm zeigt die resultierende 
Kraft zwischen Abstossung und Anziehung von zwei Atomen. Die 
resultierende Kraft ist die geometrische Summe der attraktiven und 
repulsive Kräfte, angezeigt als unterbrochene Zeilen. Der 
Trennungabstand, wenn repulsive Kraft attraktiver Kraft entspricht, 
ist die Gleichgewichttrennung. Resultierende Kraft ist an der 
Gleichgewichttrennung null.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce graphe par ligne montre la force résultante 
entre la répulsion et l'attraction de deux atomes. La force 
résultante est la somme de vecteur des forces attrayantes et 
répulsives, indiquée en tant que lignes cassées. La distance
de séparation quand la force répulsive égale la force attrayante 
est la séparation d'équilibre. La force résultante est zéro 
à la séparation d'équilibre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta linha gráfico mostra a força resultante 
entre o repulsion e a atração de dois átomos. A força 
resultante é a soma de vetor das forças atrativas e repulsive, 
indicada como linhas quebradas. A distância da separação 
quando a força repulsive iguala a força atrativa é a separação do
equilíbrio. A força resultante é zero na separação do 
equilíbrio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo grafico lineare mostra la forza risultante
fra la repulsione e un'attrazione di due atomi. La forza 
risultante è la somma di vettore delle forze attraenti e repulsive, 
indicata come linee tratteggiate. La distanza di separazione 
quando la forza repulsive è uguale la forza attraente è la 
separazione di equilibrio. La forza risultante è zero alla 
separazione di equilibrio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η γραφική παράσταση γραμμών εμφανίζει 
επακόλουθη δύναμη μεταξύ της απέχθειας και της έλξης δύο 
ατόμων. Η επακόλουθη δύναμη είναι το διανυσματικό ποσό των
ελκυστικών και αποκρουστικών δυνάμεων, που υποδεικνύεται όπως 
σπασμένες γραμμές. Η απόσταση χωρισμού όταν είναι ίση με 
η αποκρουστική δύναμη την ελκυστική δύναμη είναι ο χωρισμός 
ισορροπίας. Η επακόλουθη δύναμη είναι μηδέν στο χωρισμό 
ισορροπίας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta línea gráfico muestra la fuerza resultante
entre la repulsión y la atracción de dos átomos. La fuerza 
resultante es la suma de vector de las fuerzas atractivas y repulsive,
indicada como líneas quebradas. La distancia de la separación 
cuando la fuerza repulsive iguala la fuerza atractiva es la 
separación del equilibrio. La fuerza resultante es cero en la 
separación del equilibrio.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">attraktive Kraft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gleichgewichttrennung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">repulsive Kraft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">resultierende Kraft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">geometrische Summe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">force attrayante</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">séparation d'équilibre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">force répulsive</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">force résultante</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">somme de vecteur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">força atrativa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">separação do equilíbrio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">força repulsive</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">força resultante</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">soma de vetor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">forza attraente</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">separazione di equilibrio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">forza repulsive</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">forza risultante</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">somma di vettore</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ελκυστική δύναμη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">χωρισμός ισορροπίας</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αποκρουστική δύναμη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">επακόλουθη δύναμη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">διανυσματικό ποσό</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">fuerza atractiva</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">separación del equilibrio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">fuerza repulsive</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">fuerza resultante</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">suma de vector</string>
          </keyword>
